text: can anybody please share a example of the hsignore-file?

:thinking_face: thought we had an example in our docs. maybe it accidentally got wiped.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cms-cli#hsignore>

It works effectively the same as a gitignore file

```# ignore all files within a specific directory
/ignore/ignored
# ignore
/ignore/ignore.md
# ignore all .txt files
*.txt
# ignore all log files - useful if you commonly output serverless function logs as files.
*.log```
